! Cisco FTD Object Service Configuration
! Based on "Configure FQDN Based Object for Access Control Rule"

hostname ftd-objects
NGFW VERSION 7.4.0

object service HTTP-80
 service tcp source eq 80
!

object service HTTPS-443
 service tcp source eq https
!

object service DNS-UDP-53
 service udp source eq domain
!

object-group service WEB-SERVICES tcp
 service-object object HTTP-80
 service-object object HTTPS-443
 description "Web traffic services"
!

object network INSIDE-NETWORK
 network 192.168.1.0 255.255.255.0
 description "Internal network"
!

object-group network INSIDE-HOSTS
 network-object host 192.168.1.10
 network-object host 192.168.1.20
 network-object host 192.168.1.30
 description "Important internal hosts"
!

access-list ACL-IN extended permit tcp any object-group INSIDE-HOSTS object-group WEB-SERVICES
